metadata.name: Mutable Works 1/365
metadata.description: Mutable works is a token based solo exhibition taking place over the course of one year. Each week the NFT image will be updated with an original artwork. Token holders will see the new artwork when the metadata is refreshed. At the end of the one year exhibition collectors will vote on which of the 52 images from the exhibition will remain linked to the token forever. All current owners of my work will receive a free airdrop of this edition. Credit to @teamphlote for seeding the idea.
